resources.string: OnePlus File Manager provides file management services (the Services) within a device on these Terms of Service. By using the Services, you understand and agree to these Terms of Service. You undertake not to use the Services for any illegal purpose or by any illegal means, and you undertake to comply with applicable regulations in your country or territory and all international practices regarding the use of the internet. You agree and warrant not to use the Services to infringe upon others\' rights and interests or engage in illegal activities, including but not limited to:
A. Infringe upon others\' privacy, trade secrets, trademarks, copyrights, patents or other intellectual property rights or other rights;
B. Committing a breach of obligations under law or a contract;
C. Transmitting or spreading any data that contains computer viruses or any program code that can interrupt, damage or restrict the functions of computer software or hardware;
D. Disseminate any other laws or regulations that prohibit or the content that violates public order.
